Class TournamentManager

java.lang.Object
tournament.data.TournamentManager
public class TournamentManager extends Object
Manages tournaments, players, teams, and matches.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TournamentManager()
    Constructs a TournamentManager with default arrays for players, teams, tournaments, and matches.

  • Method Summary

    void

    void
